name: 2Doom (trashwizard)
description:
Description:

2Doom is a 2D sidescrolling shooter based off of DOOM (2016). The main mechanic that was transferred to 2D in this game, glory kills, are performed by pressing F when an enemy is low on health (tinted red). Glory killing foes will earn you points and health, so have fun and kill some aliens!

Controls:
  • WASD to move
  • Space or W to jump
  • Point and Click to shoot
  • When enemies are low on health, F to glory kill
